item.title: Hugo Test
item.description: Hugo? In which I try to set up github pages using Hugo. Following instructions from github pages startup up to step 3 Instructions from hugo, although replacing step 3 with the alternate instructions from the geekdoc theme Edited ./config.toml to include the line publishDir = "docs" Wrong turns: Considered, but discarded the idea here, as it seems iFollowing instructions here for deployment
